abstract: DST board also spurns Russell Glass’s offer to buy the company’s stake in State Street.
snippet: DST board also spurns Russell Glass’s offer to buy the company’s stake in State Street.
lead_paragraph: DST Systems, a data processor, said on Friday that its board had decided to deny a request by Russell D. Glass, an activist investor in the company, that he and two others be appointed to the company’s board.

headline.main: DST Denies Activist Investor’s Board Bid
